name: OCKContactViewDelegate
desc: A protocol that handles important events in a contact view.

items.name: func contactView(UIView & OCKContactDisplayable, senderDidInitiateAddressLookup: Any?)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the user wants to view the address of the contact.

items.name: func contactView(UIView & OCKContactDisplayable, senderDidInitiateCall: Any?)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the user would like to call the contact.

items.name: func contactView(UIView & OCKContactDisplayable, senderDidInitiateEmail: Any?)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the user would like to email the contact.

items.name: func contactView(UIView & OCKContactDisplayable, senderDidInitiateMessage: Any?)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the user would like to message the contact.

items.name: func didSelectContactView(UIView & OCKContactDisplayable)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the user selects the view that displays the contact.
